attributes.action: Address the anxieties and concerns of the EU migrants living in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Eu citizens are in a state of fear and anxiety and this is tremendously Unfair
attributes.background: Since the Brexit referendum results of june the 23rd, millions of EU citizens living in the UK have been left in a state of panic and anxiety,not knowing what the future has in store for them. EU migrants work hard and contribute to this country, they are part of the community and deserve answers.
